attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After running 43 marathons in 51 days for sport relief we believe that Eddie Izzard should receive a knighthood for his services to the sport relief charity.

He helped to raise over £1,000,000 with his efforts.

Please sign and pass on this petition and give Eddie the recognition he deserves.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
